extension.name: HelpPlugin
extension.author: Nik Trevallyn-Jones

plugin.export: Show the Help window. This method takes no arguments.
Enable context-sensitive help. This produces the same effect as selecting 'What's this?' from the help menu. This method takes no arguments.
Show help for the current input field. This produces the same effect as hitting the 'Help' key (bound to F3 by default). This method takes no arguments.

extension.comments: This plugin adds a Help menu item to AOI, and provides the supporting help viewer and search logic.

history.log: - fixed Help beanshell scripts to match HelpPlugin exported methods - internationalised the "Help | About" text
- included French and German GUI translation files
- Accomodate API changes in AOI 2.6
- beta release -- in-line image feature deactivated until a better image viewer widget is incorporated. -- internationalisation of menus and GUI implemented

- More changes to LiveHelp -- links can be browsed in external browser (Firefox, IE, etc) -- Save button implemented -- Settings button implemented -- in-line images implemented -- /me chat finally working

- Changes to LiveHelp (chat client) -- rendering now in HTML -- cut-n-paste now supported -- URL parsed into hyperlinks -- clicking on a hyperlink browses the page in a separate tab -- any page (chat or web) can be printed directly
- code reorg for easier builds with AOI - LiveHelp now made a separate process, so AOI can be shut down, and the current chat session survives.
- Updated to be compatible with AOI 2.5 - minor change to stop the first page being displayed in French
- minor bug fix that could cause a null pointer - made memory display in HelpAbout clearer - source and build file rearranged to suit inclusion with AOI
- fixing problems with inclusion of latest helpset translations.
- updates to the French translation (more thanks to Francois!).
- imported the French translation of the AOIHelp helpset - thanks Francois!

- re-enabled the JavaHelp code as Sun have now (this morning) released JavaHelp under the GPL. -- The code attempts to switch gracefully from JavaHelp to HelpGUI if the JavaHelp jars are not found, but this doesn't actually work. -- text-search, context-sensitive help and ActiveLinks are available again.

- port to HelpGUI viewer, and removal of all dependancies on Sun's JavaHelp. -- This is due to the restrictive and onerous requirements of Sun's JavaHelp Binary Licence. -- With this initial version, text-search, context-sensitive help and Object tags are unavailable.
- initial release of the AOI chat client - changed to use plugin resources for plugin helpsets
- created default HowTo content
- modified FurtherHelp.html to make all download links ActiveLinks

- restructured AOIHelp to simplify multiple language support. -- created helpset projects for DE, IT, and ES locales.
- minor enhancement to better support an AOI locale different to the system locale.
- replaced InstallBean class with generic ActiveLink class
- added ability for buttons to download content using SPManager
- more content - added a small IRC client for IRC help.
- more content: -- GettingStarted now done (first cut). -- Hourglass tutorial integrated (language issues still open) -- CSH ids now point into the documentation
- added further protection against missing files.

- fixes for CSH -- mapping entries now use double-quotes (JavaHelp doesn't recognise single quote) -- auto register LayoutWindow and DockableWidgets -- Key mappings moved to F1, F2, F3 -- Help About completed

- fixes for windows - added component registration methods, for CSH - added keystroke mappings for help keys - added support for plugin help - added mapfile generation if a flag is set in the helpflags file
- initial coding
